Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with street cleaning parking rules
Summary: Relates to owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with street cleaning parking rules; relates to access to records prepared pursuant to street cleaning parking rules.
LawCode: Amd V & T L, generally; amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with street cleaning parking rules; to amend the public officers law, in relation to access to records prepared pursuant to street cleaning parking rules; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
